snippet: From now through the summer, visitors to Madrid can see first-rate Spanish dance and flamenco performed Wednesday through Sunday nights at the 540-seat, Florida Park theater in elegant Retiro Park
abstract: From now through the summer, visitors to Madrid can see first-rate Spanish dance and flamenco performed Wednesday through Sunday nights at the 540-seat, Florida Park theater in elegant Retiro Park

headline.main: Flamenco, and Food, in Madrid's Retiro Park
